title: The The Rarities - interview, singles, remixes TheThe
description:
A treasure chest of TheThe rarities.  I know the proper spelling is The The as two words, but I spell it as one to make searching on my system easier.  


******************************

Alive - 1989    Promo interview CD with live and studio tracks

Kingdom Of Rain     5:42   
Why Tour Now?     1:26   
How Did You Create The Band?     0:59   
The Beat(en) Generation (Live)     2:18   
Creation Of The Live Show     1:07   
Heartland (Live)     4:29   
Johnny Marr     2:35   
This Is The Day     4:52   
Band And Self-Progression     2:28   
Why Use Pop Music?     1:16   
Infected (Live)     4:18   
Sinead O'Connor And Kingdom Of Rain     0:52   
Does Beyond Love Mean Rebirth?     1:31   
Beyond Love (Live)     6:44  


Matt Johnson interviewed about Mind Bomb.
Live tracks recorded at the Horden Pavilion, Sydney, Australia on August 4, 1989

******************************

I Saw The Light single - 1995 US CD version

I Saw The Light     2:41   
I'm Free At Last     2:35   
Someday You'll Call My Name     2:38   
There's No Room In My Heart For The Blues     2:49 

The three non-album tracks have some chatter and false starts on them, so I also included some edited versions.

******************************

Interpretations: Issue One - ShrunkenMan - 2000

Instead of putting non-album tracks or tedious remixes on the first single from his "Nakedself" album, he invited three other artists to reinterpret the song in their own way.

TheThe Ã¢â‚¬â€œ   ShrunkenMan (single mix)    4:52   
DAAU Ã¢â‚¬â€œ   ShrunkenMan     4:49   
John Parish Ã¢â‚¬â€œ   ShrunkenMan     4:24   
Foetus Ã¢â‚¬â€œ   ShrunkenMan     5:00 

******************************

Jealous of Youth - 1990   non-album single 

Jealous of Youth (7" Version)     4:18   
Beyond Love     4:20   
Jealous of Youth (12" Version)     6:41 

******************************

Slow Emotion Replay  CD single - 1993

1    Slow Emotion Replay    3:56   
2    Scenes From 'Arctic Twilight'    8:51   
Part 1    Ancient Lights        
Part 2    Wounded        
Part 3    Balloon        
Part 4    Unseasonable Weather        
Part 5    Arctic Twilight  

******************************

Cold Spell Ahead single, originally issued on vinyl in 1981, this is from the 1992 CD re-release

Cold Spell Ahead     3:55               (if you're not familiar with this, it could be considered a demo version of Uncertain Smile)
Hot Ice     5:35

******************************

Dogs of Lust 1992                    Promo CD Single - I got this as a bonus when I bought "Dusk" at a midnight release party.

Dogs of Lust (Album Version)     3:08   
Dogs of Lust (Spermicide Mix)    5:55   
Dogs of Lust (Squirmicide Mix)    4:15  

******************************

Armageddon Days Are Here (Again) - 1989   CD single

Armageddon Days Are Here (Again) (Album Version)    5:44   
Nature of Virtue    4:47   
Mental Healing Process     3:44   
Perfect    5:41 

******************************

Solitude - 1994    This is a non-UK combination of the "Shades of Blue" and "Dis-Infected" EPs, plus a bonus remix

That Was The Day        
Dis-Infected        
Jealous of Youth        
The Violence of Truth (Remix)        
Helpline Operator (Sick Boy Mix)        
Another Boy Drowning (Live)        
Solitude        
Dolphins        
Dogs of Lust (Germicide Mix)  

******************************

Untitled - 1981                   track from the "Some Bizarre" compilation.  This is from the 2008 remastered re-release.

******************************

.wma format, variable bit rate, except the last one is mp3.
